title: The uniform structure generated by a metric

blocks.name: metuval
blocks.content: Value of the uniform structure generated by metric ` D ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm metuval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cfv(cmetu, c0), co(cxp(c1, c1), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cmetu, c0, co(cxp(c1, c1), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), cuni(crn(cpsmet)), co(cxp(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  df-metu(hs0, s0)
  oveq12d(cxp(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), cdm(cdm(cv(hs0)))), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), cxp(c1, c1), crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sqxpeqd(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eqtr4d(cdm(cdm(cv(hs0))), c1, cdm(cdm(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dmeqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  dmeqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(c1, cdm(cdm(c0))))
  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  rneqd(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  mpteq2dva(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  imaeq1d(ccnv(cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)), ccnv(c0), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  cnveqd(cv(hs0), c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), crp))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cpsmet))), wrex(hs1, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(hs1)))))
  mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wrex(hs1, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c1, cdm(cpsmet)))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  rspcev(hs1, c1, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(hs1))))
  eleq2d(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(hs1)), cfv(cpsmet, c1), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), c1, cpsmet)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cuni(crn(cpsmet))), wrex(hs1, cdm(cpsmet), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, cv(hs1))))), wfun(cpsmet))
  funmpt2(hs2, cpsmet, universe, crab(hs4, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))), wral(hs3, cv(hs2), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs3), cv(hs4), cv(hs3)), nat0), wral(hs5, cv(hs2), wral(hs6, cv(hs2), wbr(co(cv(hs3), cv(hs4), cv(hs5)), cle, co(co(cv(hs6), cv(hs4), cv(hs3)), cxad, co(cv(hs6), cv(hs4), cv(hs5))))))))))
  df-psmet(hs2, hs4, hs3, hs5, hs6)
  elunirn(hs1, cpsmet, c0)
  ovexd(cxp(c1, c1), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cxp(c1, c1), cfg, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(cuni(crn(cpsmet)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cpsmet))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  diff.hs4.s(hs6)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs6)
  diff.hs3.s(hs6)
  diff.hs5.s(hs6)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.c(cpsmet)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm metuval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚Üí(metUnif ` c0)=((c1 √ó c1)[filGen]ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, cmetu, c0, ((c1 √ó c1)[filGen]ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))), ‚ãÉ ran(PsMet), ((dom(dom(hs0))√ó dom(dom(hs0)))[filGen]ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' hs0 "(0[[,)]s0))))), universe, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  df-metu(hs0, s0)
  oveq12d((dom(dom(hs0))√ó dom(dom(hs0))), cfg, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' hs0 "(0[[,)]s0)))), (c1 √ó c1), ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  sqxpeqd(dom(dom(hs0)), c1, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  eqtr4d(dom(dom(hs0)), c1, dom(dom(c0)), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  dmeqd(hs0, c0, (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0, c1 = dom(dom(c0)))
  psmetdmdm(c0, c1)
  rneqd((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' hs0 "(0[[,)]s0))), (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  mpteq2dva(s0, crp, (`' hs0 "(0[[,)]s0)), (`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0))
  imaeq1d(`' hs0, (0[[,)]s0), `' c0, ((c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0)‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+))
  cnveqd(hs0, c0, ((c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß hs0 = c0)‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+))
  simplr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0, s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+)
  sylibr(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(PsMet), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà dom(PsMet), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` hs1)))
  mpancom(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà dom(PsMet), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` hs1)), c1 ‚àà dom(PsMet))
  elfvdm(c0, cpsmet, c1)
  rspcev(hs1, c1, dom(PsMet), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` hs1))
  eleq2d(c0, (PsMet ` hs1), (PsMet ` c1), hs1 = c1)
  fveq2(hs1, c1, cpsmet)
  ax-mp((c0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ ran(PsMet)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà dom(PsMet), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` hs1))), Fun(PsMet))
  funmpt2(hs2, cpsmet, universe, { hs4 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](hs2 √ó hs2))| ‚àÄ(hs3 ‚àà hs2,((hs3[hs4]hs3)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs5 ‚àà hs2, ‚àÄ(hs6 ‚àà hs2,(hs3[hs4]hs5)[‚â§]((hs6[hs4]hs3)[+](hs6[hs4]hs5))))))})
  df-psmet(hs2, hs4, hs3, hs5, hs6)
  elunirn(hs1, cpsmet, c0)
  ovexd((c1 √ó c1), cfg, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))), c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(((c1 √ó c1)[filGen]ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(‚ãÉ ran(PsMet))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), hs0 = c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(dom(PsMet))
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1))
  diff.hs4.s(hs6)
  diff.hs2.s(hs4)
  diff.hs4.s(hs3)
  diff.hs4.s(hs5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs6)
  diff.hs3.s(hs6)
  diff.hs5.s(hs6)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs5)
  diff.hs3.s(hs5)
  diff.hs1.c(cpsmet)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: metustel
blocks.content: Define a filter base ` F ` generated by a metric ` D ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm metustel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, c3), wrex(s0, crp, wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wrex(s0, crp, wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))))
  eleq2i(c2, c3, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, crp, wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, universe)))
  elex(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  rexlimdvw(s0, crp, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wi(wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), universe))
  cnvexg(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  imaexg(ccnv(c0), universe, co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))
  eleq1a(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), universe, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))), wrex(s0, crp, wceq(c2, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))))
  elrnmpt(s0, c2, universe, cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm metustel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà c3 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c3 = ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5bb(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), c2 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))), c2 ‚àà ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))))
  eleq2i(c2, c3, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))))
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), c2 ‚àà ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (c2 ‚àà ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå))
  elex(c2, ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))))
  rexlimdvw(s0, crp, c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)), c2 ‚àà ùïå)
  3syl(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))‚Üí c2 ‚àà ùïå), `' c0 ‚àà ùïå, (`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))‚àà ùïå)
  cnvexg(c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  imaexg(`' c0, universe, (0[[,)]s0))
  eleq1a((`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)), universe, c2)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1), (c2 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(c2 ‚àà ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+, c2 =(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))))
  elrnmpt(s0, c2, universe, (s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))), crp, (`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0)))
  eqid((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù+ ‚Ü¶(`' c0 "(0[[,)]s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (PsMet ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: metustss
blocks.content: Range of the elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm metustss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(c2, cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  elpwid(c2, cxp(c1, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))
  sseldd(c2, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), c3, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl5eqss(c3, cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wral(s0, crp, wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1)))))
  ralrimiva(s0, crp, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1))))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), crp)), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1)))
  fssdm(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1), c0, cxr, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)))
  cnvimass(c0, co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))
  psmetf(c0, c1)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s0), crp), wb(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1))))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wb(wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1))), wss(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cxp(c1, c1))), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe), wcel(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), universe))
  cnvexg(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  imaexg(ccnv(c0), universe, co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))
  elpwg(cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), universe, cxp(c1, c1))
  rnmptss(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))), cpw(cxp(c1, c1)), cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpsmet, c1)
  diff.cpsmet.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.crp.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxp(c1, c1))

blocks.name: metustrel
blocks.content: Elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` are relations. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm metustrel(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wrel(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c0), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)), wrel(c2), wss(c2, cxp(universe, universe)))
  syl6ss(c2, cxp(universe, universe), cxp(c1, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cpsmet, c1)), wcel(c2, c3)))
  metustss(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  xpss(c1, c1)
  df-rel(c2)
}

} = {
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3), Rel(c2), c2 ‚äÜ(ùïå √ó ùïå))
  syl6ss(c2, (ùïå √ó ùïå), (c1 √ó c1), (c0 ‚àà(PsMet ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà c3))
  metustss(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  xpss(c1, c1)
  df-rel(c2)
}

blocks.content: The identity diagonal is included in all elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)

blocks.name: metustsym
blocks.content: Elements of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` are symmetric. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: metustexhalf
blocks.content: For any element ` A ` of the filter base generated by the metric ` D ` , the half element (corresponding to half the distance) is also in this base. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: metustfbas
blocks.content: The filter base generated by a metric ` D ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.) (Proof shortened by Peter Mazsa, 2-Oct-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm metustfbas(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, cxp(c0, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(cmpt(s0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cfbas, cxp(c0, c0))), wss(c2, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), w3a(wne(c2, emptycls), wnel(emptycls, c2), wral(hs1, c2, wral(hs2, c2, wrex(hs0, c2, wss(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wss(c2, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))))
  sylibr(wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wss(c2, cpw(cxp(c0, c0))), wral(hs1, c2, wss(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0))))
  ralrimiv(hs1, c2, wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wss(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0)))
  sylbid(wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wss(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0)), wrex(s0, crp, wceq(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0))))))
  rexlimdvw(s0, crp, wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), wss(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0)))
  ex(wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(s0)))), wss(cv(hs1), cxp(c0, c0)))

blocks.name: cfilucfil
blocks.content: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the filter bases which contain balls of any pre-chosen size. See ~ iscfil . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 29-Nov-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: metuust
blocks.content: The uniform structure generated by metric ` D ` is a uniform structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm metuust(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))), wcel(cfv(cmetu, c1), cfv(cust, c0)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(cmetu, c1), cfv(cust, c0), co(cxp(c0, c0), cfg, crn(cmpt(hs0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0)))))), wa(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0))))
  adantl(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cfv(cpsmet, c0)), wceq(cfv(cmetu, c1), co(cxp(c0, c0), cfg, crn(cmpt(hs0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0))))))))
  metuval(hs0, c1, c0)
  metust(hs1, c0, c1, crn(cmpt(hs0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0))))))
  rneqi(cmpt(hs0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0)))), cmpt(hs1, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1)))))
  cbvmptv(hs0, hs1, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0))), cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1))))
  imaeq2d(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0)), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), nat0, cico)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(crn(cmpt(hs0, crp, cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0))))))
  diff.hs0.c(crp)

  diff.hs1.c(crp)
  diff.hs1.c(cima(ccnv(c1), co(nat0, cico, cv(hs0))))
}

blocks.name: cfilucfil2
blocks.content: Given a metric ` D ` and a uniform structure generated by that metric, Cauchy filter bases on that uniform structure are exactly the filter bases which contain balls of any pre-chosen size. See ~ iscfil . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)

  metuval(s1, c1, c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: metustbl
blocks.content: The "section" image of an entourage at a point ` P ` always contains a ball (centered on this point). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: psmetutop
blocks.content: The topology induced by a uniform structure generated by a metric ` D ` is generated by that metric's open balls. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Dec-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: xmetutop
blocks.content: The topology induced by a uniform structure generated by an extended metric ` D ` is that metric's open sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Mar-2018.)

blocks.name: xmsusp
blocks.content: If the uniform set of a metric space is the uniform structure generated by its metric, then it is a uniform space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 14-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm xmsusp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cxms), wceq(c2, cfv(cmetu, c3))), wcel(c1, cusp))

  -| wceq(c3, cres(cfv(cds, c1), cxp(c0, c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuss, c1))
} = {
  sylanbrc(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cxms), wceq(c2, cfv(cmetu, c3))), wcel(c1, cusp), wcel(c2, cfv(cust, c0)), wceq(cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cutop, c2)))
  eqeltrd(c2, cfv(cust, c0), cfv(cmetu, c3), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cxms), wceq(c2, cfv(cmetu, c3))))

  3eqtr4rd(cfv(ctopn, c1), cfv(cutop, c2), cfv(cutop, cfv(cmetu, c3)), cfv(cmopn, c3), w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cxms), wceq(c2, cfv(cmetu, c3))))
  syl2anc(w3a(wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c1, cxms), wceq(c2, cfv(cmetu, c3))), wceq(cfv(cutop, cfv(cmetu, c3)), cfv(cmopn, c3)), wne(c0, emptycls), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c0)))

blocks.name: metucn
blocks.content: Uniform continuity in metric spaces. Compare the order of the quantifiers with ~ metcn . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2018.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
